Here we give an overview where and how we gathered the data. 

## MUST-B EFSA data source

Data downloaded from https://zenodo.org/record/4953762#.YYQmzJso_s2, we used v2 because it included GPS positions of sites. 

## Foraging hours

We downloaded site-specific irradiaten and temperature data from https://re.jrc.ec.europa.eu/pvg_tools/en/#TMY
